00081 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_HAVEALLNAMES 1
00082 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_HAVEBANLIST (1 << 1)
00083 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_HAVEWHOLIST (1 << 2)
00084 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_HAVEBANEXCEPTIONLIST (1 << 3)
00085 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_HAVEINVITELIST (1 << 4)
00086 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_DEADCHAN (1 << 5)
00087 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_SENTBANLISTREQUEST (1 << 6)
00088 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_SENTBANEXCEPTIONLISTREQUEST (1 << 7)
00089 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_SENTINVITELISTREQUEST (1 << 8)
00090 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_SENTWHOREQUEST (1 << 9)
00091 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_SENTPART (1 << 10)
00092 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_SYNCHRONIZED (1 << 11)
00093 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_NOCLOSEONPART (1 << 12)
00094 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_SENTSYNCWHOREQUEST (1 << 13)

00130 typedef struct _KviChannelAction
00131 {
00132         QString      szNick;       // action source nick
00133         unsigned int uActionType;  // type of the action
00134         kvi_time_t   tTime;        // time of the action
00135         int          iTemperature; // temperature of the action
00136 } KviChannelAction;
00137 
00143 typedef struct _KviChannelActivityStats
00144 {
00145         unsigned int        uActionCount;              // number of actions in the history
00146         bool                bStatsInaccurate;          // the stats are inaccurate because we have just joined the chan
00147         unsigned int        uLastActionTimeSpan;       // the timespan between the last action and now
00148         unsigned int        uFirstActionTimeSpan;      // the time span between the first and the last action
00149         double              dActionsPerMinute;         // average number of actions per minute in the lastActionTimeSpan
00150         unsigned int        uActionsInTheLastMinute;   // number of actions in the last minute
00151         int                 iAverageActionTemperature; // the average chan temperature
00152         unsigned int        uHotActionCount;
00153         unsigned int        uHotActionPercent;
00154         QStringList         lTalkingUsers;             // users that seem to be talking NOW
00155         QStringList         lWereTalkingUsers;
00156 } KviChannelActivityStats;
